Summary: Ufos lands on my wifes mountains1
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife went out side for cigarette and the skies were clear. All of a sudden she looked at me with excitement.She said to take off my bra and you can feel my mountains. I felt here left mountain and a ufo landed on here right mountain. Soft landing for both of us.
trends: there has been one other sighting in cms\tg
there were no other sightings in cms\tg on or around november 28th 2008
